c74object.name: sy.is
c74object.digest: Map each character to its category
c74object.description: Translates any incoming symbol into a list of numbers or symbols, one for each character, determining the character type.

inlet.digest: Incoming symbol or list of symbols

outlet.digest: List of integers representing character types
List of symbols representing character types

method.name: anything
method.description: For each character of any incoming symbol, an integer is created in the output list, representing the character type.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Output character types of last input
method.description: Output the character types for the most recently received input data.

attribute.name: groups
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to only output the letter group (first uppercase letter) in the textual representation of characters. By default this is inactive, so categories are represented by two letters (a uppercase one and a lowercase one, as a further specification)

attribute.name: maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
